questions.quote: Hey, believe me, you were better off not knowing. It's not easy to deal with someone in a situation like this. I was so nice to him I almost made myself sick.
Hey! So what's the deal with brunch, I mean that if it's a combination of breakfast and lunch. How comes there's no lupper or no linner.
Oh no, not more checks. They're coming faster than I can sign 'em.
Ah, listen ah, I don't mean to bother you but ah, silly me, I- I think I may have left my hat in your apartment. So ah, I thought I'd just come by later and pick it up.
Well, I'm sorry, Jerry, we all don't have checks rolling in like you do.
Well, actually, Jerry, we wanted to talk to you about something.
I dunno, some designer. Anyway, Brett is so generous, and sensitive. Last night he was moved just listening to a song.
You don't understand, someone's after us, a crazy clown is trying to kill us.
It's my money. What should I do? Throw it out the window? I know a guy who took his vacation on his change.
I just got the most bizarre message from you father, Steinbrenner is at you house, they think you're dead!
